# opnsense_acmeclient_settings (Resource)

Manage an OPNsense acmeclient plugin settings.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "opnsense_acmeclient_settings" "example" {
  enabled             = false
  auto_renewal        = true
  haproxy_integration = false
  log_level           = "debug3"
  show_intro          = false
  challenge_port      = 42580
  tls_challenge_port  = 42581
  restart_timeout     = 600
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `auto_renewal` (Boolean) Automatically renew certificates.
- `challenge_port` (Number) Port used for HTTP-01 challenge. Defaults to 80.
- `enabled` (Boolean) Enable the ACME client.
- `haproxy_integration` (Boolean) Enable HAProxy integration.
- `log_level` (String) Log level for ACME client (`normal`, `extended`, `debug`, `debug2`, `debug3`).
- `restart_timeout` (Number) Seconds to wait for service restart operations. Defaults to 60.
- `show_intro` (Boolean) Show the introductory/help text in the UI.
- `tls_challenge_port` (Number) Port used for TLS-ALPN-01 challenge. Defaults to 443.
